title: FS: t206 Bresnahan PSA 5 & Chase SGC 40

posts.post_title: FS: t206 Bresnahan PSA 5 & Chase SGC 40
posts.post_content:
The following PSA graded t206 cards are available for sale. Please contact me if you have questions. Prices include delivery. Scans available upon request. Please pay through paypal gift, check, money order, or add 3% to cover paypal fees.
1) Roger Bresnahan with Bat PSA 5 $250
2) Hal Chase Throwing Black Hat SGC 40 (Polar Bear) $45 SOLD
Will take the Chase PB - email sent.
